Bluebell Therapy

Contact Me

How to contact me

I understand that contacting a counsellor can be a huge step for many people. It can be difficult to admit that we are experiencing problems and even harder to ask for help.

Therapy can be a great way of accessing your own inner resources to deal with challenges in your life and my role is to facilitate that inner journey. You will never be judged and will always be treated with respect and dignity.

If you're thinking about starting therapy, please give me a call and we can have a chat about what it could do for you and whether I might be the right person to help you.

Contact Me

If you would like a chat about how therapy can help you:

Call 07592706433 or email bluebelltherapy@gmail.com
